text: Aur Allah Taalaa ney jo kheti aur mawashi peda kiye hain inn logon ney inn mein say kuch hissa Allah ka muqarrar kiya aur ba-zom khud kehtay hain kay yeh to Allah ka hai aur yeh humaray maboodon ka hai phir jo cheez inn kay maboodon ki hoti hai woh to Allah ki taraf nahi phonchti aur jo cheez Allah ki hoti hai woh inn kay maboodon ki taraf phonch jati hai kiya bura faisla woh kertay hain
